intro: ^Rashad?Smiling "Hey there, adventurer! What's new with you?"

s: ^Oh, you know, just running all over town.

Chat1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yeah, that sounds about right. Is the block party planning going ok?"

s: ^Yeah, it's going pretty well! Things seem to be coming together.
^Yeah, all good. Hey, can I actually ask you a health question?

Chat2: ^Rashad?Smiling "That's good to hear. Don't stress yourself out about it too much, I'm sure it'll be fantastic."

s: ^Thanks, Rashad. And of course it'll be great, you'll be doing storytime! Right...?

Chat3: ^Rashad?Smiling "Ha, I'm still thinking about it. But anyways, what brings you to my neck of the woods?"

s: ^I need to do some research on diabetes, actually.
^You wouldn't happen to know anything about diabetes, would you?

Explain1: ^Rashad?Neutral "Well, I know a little. My cousin actually has type 2 diabetes. What do you wanna know?"

s: ^A friend of mine was wondering what it takes to diagnose diabetes, and how it gets treated. They think a relative might have it.
^Do you know how testing and treatment for diabetes works at all?

Explain2: ^Rashad?Neutral "Hmm... I think he had to go to the doctor and do a blood test, and he got diagnosed that way."
^Rashad?Neutral "In terms of treatment, I know he carries a blood glucose meter with him, but I don't know much more than that."

s: ^Did your cousin have to change his lifestyle or anything?
^Do you know if your cousin has to take any medications?

Suggestion1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yeah, he has to be more careful about what he eats, and make an effort to get out and exercise."
^Rashad?Smiling "Oh! You know what, I think he takes insulin shots, too. I remember him mentioning that once."
^Rashad?Smiling "I don't think all people with type 2 diabetes have to do that, though. A lot depends on the situation, which is why a doctor is in charge in these situations."
^Rashad_Day 4_Diet, exercise, and insulin shots can help treat diabetes_Elisa4

Suggestion1.#: notification Rashad_Day 4_Diet, exercise, and insulin shots can help treat diabetes_Elisa4

s: ^What is diabetes, anyway? I still don't really understand.
^Thanks Rashad, I think that'll help my friend a lot!

Suggestion2: ^Rashad?Smiling "It has to do with the pancreas, I think. Insulin is stuff in your bloodstream that regulates blood sugar levels- that's how they're actually able to diagnose diabetes."
^Rashad?Smiling "If your blood sugar levels are too high, they know your insulin levels are out of balance."
^Rashad?Smiling "All the treatment stuff they do - exercise, healthy eating, medication- is to try to get those levels back to normal."
^Rashad_Day 4_Treating diabetes has to do with regulating blood sugar levels_Elisa4

Suggestion2.#: notification Rashad_Day 4_Treating diabetes has to do with regulating blood sugar levels_Elisa4

s: ^So, does your cousin have to do anything specific to take care of himself?

Goodbye: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yeah, no worries! If you think of anything other questions, just let me know. Farewell, adventurer!"
